Package org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql.epsg

package org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql.epsg
SQL scripts for EPSG geodetic data set installation. The EPSG geodetic dataset provides definitions for thousands of Coordinate Reference Systems (CRS), together with parameter values for thousands of Coordinate Operations between various CRS pairs. This module contains the SQL scripts for creating a local copy of EPSG geodetic dataset.

Licensing

EPSG is maintained by the International Association of Oil and Gas Producers (IOGP) Surveying & Positioning Committee and is subject to EPSG terms of use. This module is not included in the Apache SIS distribution of convenience binaries, and the source code contains only the Java classes without the EPSG data. For use in an application, see How to use EPSG geodetic dataset on the SIS web site.
Since:
0.7
